pages.text: As I continue to expand my factory, I am thinking that, perhaps, Mana-based generation of rotational force is not as feasible as I thought. If I am to truly industrialize my base, I ought to look into a new way of getting power.$(br2)  Lately, I have been considering the thorium I can find in the Nether. It's radioactive, and so I may be able to use it to heat steam engines... and other things. But... how do I construct a suitable nuclear reactor?

pages.title: Going Nuclear
pages.text: My efforts have bore fruit. I am now the proud owner of a nuclear reactor, whose heat should suffice enough to drive a steam engine or two. Better yet, the thorium fuel is wholly renewable - though it seems to be a somewhat odd process.
